response.original_title: The Not so Big House: Home by Design
response.overview: Author/Architect Sarah Susanka brings her "not so big" concepts to DVD in a special called THE NOT SO BIG HOUSE: HOME BY DESIGN. Watch as Sarah presents residential design principles that emphasize quality over quantity.  The program features "Not So Big Design Case Study" videos of well-designed homes that exemplify her design approach. Whether building a new home, remodeling a dwelling or trying to find more day-to-day pleasure in the limited space of a condo or apartment, this program matches homes with today's lifestyles.
response.tagline: Join architect and best-selling author Sarah Susanka as she shares her ideas on design that are revolutionizing the American home.
response.title: The Not so Big House: Home by Design
